parameters: Okay! We've opened up a path to the mako reactor.
I’ll go in and set the rest of the explosives.
You guys keep watch at the entrance.
We're up. We'll enter the reactor as planned.
\n<Tseng>This is critical, so pay close attention!
\n<Tseng>The reactor’s underground entrance has been blasted
\n<Cissnei>This is getting serious. What are they after?
\n<Tseng>They're aiming for the reactor core. You MUST stop
\n<Cissnei>That’s far enough! You didn’t think you'd actually get
